Package aka.jmetadata.main

Main package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractJMetadata
    AbstractJMetadata is a basic abstract class providing basic methods for metadata extraction.
    AbstractStreamJMetadata
    AbstractStreamJMetadata is an abstract class providing commons methods for metadata extraction.
    JMetadata
    Main class to use to extract metadata informations.
    JMetadataAudio
    This class contains all methods to extract audio informations of a specific audio stream.
    JMetadataChapter
    This class contains all methods to extract audio informations of a specific chapter stream.
    JMetadataGeneral
    This class contains all methods to extract main informations of the file (either container or stream).
    JMetadataMenu
    This class contains all methods to extract audio informations of a specific menu stream.
    JMetadataSubtitle
    This class contains all methods to extract audio informations of a specific subtitle stream.
    JMetadataVideo
    This class contains all methods to extract audio informations of a specific video stream.

Package aka.jmetadata.main Description

Main package.

For regular media files (like ".mpg" or ".avi") the track information is available after the media has been parsed (or played).

For DVD media files (like ".iso" files) the track information is not available after the media has been parsed, a video output must have been created, and even then the video track width/height might not be available until a short time later.

In all cases, the other functions for title, video, audio and chapter descriptions require that a video output has been created before they return valid information.

Author:
Charlotte
